original: intros H. apply Series_ext. intros k. destruct (Nat.ltb k n) eqn:Hkn. - apply Nat.ltb_lt in Hkn. apply H in Hkn. auto. - apply Nat.ltb_ge in Hkn. apply PeanoNat.Nat.ge_le in Hkn. rewrite <- plus_n_O. destruct (PeanoNat.Nat.le_gt_cases k (n + 0)) as [Hle | Hgt]. + rewrite Plus.le_plus_l in Hle. apply PeanoNat.Nat.eq_le_incl in Hle. replace n with (k - n + n) in Hle by (symmetry; apply PeanoNat.Nat.sub_add; auto). remember (k - n)%nat as m. replace (n + m)%nat with k. * apply H. apply PeanoNat.Nat.lt_succ_r in Hgt. symmetry in Heqm. apply PeanoNat.Nat.sub_0_le in Heqm. rewrite PeanoNat.Nat.add_0_r in Heqm. apply PeanoNat.Nat.add_le_mono_r in Heqm. auto. * rewrite Heqm. auto. + exfalso. apply Nat.lt_irrefl with k. apply (PeanoNat.Nat.lt_le_trans _ (n + 0)); auto.
